announcements.title: Spring Sports Registration
announcements.description: Spring sports registration opens on January 15th. Get ready to join our baseball, softball, or track and field teams. Details on tryouts and practices to follow.

announcements.title: New Student Orientation
announcements.description: Welcome to all our new students! New student orientation will be held on January 8th to help you get acclimated to our school community.

announcements.title: Winter Break Closure
announcements.description: School will be closed for Winter Break from December 23rd to January 3rd. Enjoy the holidays and stay safe!

announcements.title: Yearbook Pre-Orders Open
announcements.description: Don't miss out on the memories! Yearbook pre-orders are now open. Order your copy by December 20th to secure the lowest price.

announcements.title: Winter Concert Save the Date
announcements.description: Our Winter Concert is scheduled for December 15th. Enjoy the musical talents of our students as they perform holiday classics and seasonal favorites.

announcements.title: National Honor Society Induction
announcements.description: Congratulations to our outstanding students! The National Honor Society induction ceremony will take place on November 12th. Parents and members, please RSVP.

announcements.title: Parent Workshop Series
announcements.description: Enhance your parenting skills with our workshop series. Topics include effective communication, homework help, and managing screen time. First session on November 5th.

announcements.title: Halloween Costume Contest
announcements.description: Get ready for the spookiest day of the year! We'll be hosting a Halloween costume contest on October 31st. Prizes for the best costumes, so start planning your outfits now.

announcements.title: Fall Festival Fundraiser
announcements.description: Our Fall Festival fundraiser is on October 28th. Bring your family for games, food, and entertainment. All proceeds support school programs and activities.

announcements.title: College Fair for High School Students
announcements.description: High school students, mark your calendars for the College Fair on October 20th. Explore college options, meet admissions representatives, and gather valuable information for your future.

announcements.title: PTA Meeting Invitation
announcements.description: All parents are invited to our Parent-Teacher Association (PTA) meeting on October 15th at 7:00 PM. Join us to discuss upcoming events, fundraising, and ways to support our school.

announcements.title: Spirit Week Announcement
announcements.description: Spirit Week is back! From October 9th to 13th, show your school spirit by participating in themed dress-up days, contests, and fun activities. Get creative with your outfits!

announcements.title: Book Fair Coming Soon
announcements.description: Get ready for our annual Book Fair from October 2nd to 6th. Explore a world of books and reading adventures. Stay tuned for more information on featured titles and special events.

announcements.title: School Picture Day
announcements.description: Smile! School picture day is on September 25th. Dress your best and capture memories with your classmates. Picture package information will be distributed in advance.

announcements.title: Parent-Teacher Conferences Scheduled
announcements.description: Parent-teacher conferences will be held on September 18th. This is a valuable opportunity to discuss your child's progress and academic goals. Sign-up details coming soon.

announcements.title: Spring Sports Registration
announcements.description: Spring sports registration opens on January 15th. Get ready to join our baseball, softball, or track and field teams. Details on tryouts and practices to follow.

announcements.title: New Student Orientation
announcements.description: Welcome to all our new students! New student orientation will be held on January 8th to help you get acclimated to our school community.
